response.original_title: How do I get my money back from Uphold? ⟦Instant Help⟧
response.overview: To get money back from Uphold,+1 (888) 574-7167 withdraw funds directly to your linked bank account or debit card via the "Transact" panel, typically taking 3–7 business days for ACH or instant for debit cards+1 (888) 574-7167. If a transaction is pending or failed, contact support immediately with your transaction ID +1 (888) 574-7167. Note that completed crypto transactions are generally irreversible.  contact their support through the Help Center +1 (888) 574-7167, providing the transaction ID, date, and reason for the request
